sqlMap.statement: SELECT CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD AS CODE ,CMPY.COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CMPY CMPY WHERE CMPY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CMPY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD ) ORDER BY CMPY.COA_CMPY_SORT_NUM

SELECT AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD AS CODE ,AFFL.COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_AFFL AFFL WHERE AFFL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND AFFL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD ) ORDER BY AFFL.COA_AFFL_SORT_NUM

SELECT BR.COA_BR_CD AS CODE ,BR.COA_BR_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_BR BR WHERE BR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND BR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= BR.COA_BR_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= BR.COA_BR_CD ) ORDER BY BR.COA_BR_SORT_NUM

SELECT CC.COA_CC_CD AS CODE ,CC.COA_CC_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CC CC WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= CC.COA_CC_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= CC.COA_CC_CD ) ORDER BY CC.COA_CC_SORT_NUM

SELECT ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD AS CODE ,ACCT.COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_ACCT ACCT WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD ) ORDER BY ACCT.COA_ACCT_SORT_NUM

SELECT PROD.COA_PROD_CD AS CODE ,PROD.COA_PROD_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_PROD PROD WHERE PROD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND PROD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= PROD.COA_PROD_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= PROD.COA_PROD_CD ) ORDER BY PROD.COA_PROD_SORT_NUM

SELECT CH.COA_CH_CD AS CODE ,CH.COA_CH_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CH CH WHERE CH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= CH.COA_CH_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= CH.COA_CH_CD ) ORDER BY CH.COA_CH_SORT_NUM

SELECT PROJ.COA_PROJ_CD AS CODE ,PROJ.COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_PROJ PROJ WHERE PROJ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND PROJ.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= PROJ.COA_PROJ_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= PROJ.COA_PROJ_CD ) ORDER BY PROJ.COA_PROJ_SORT_NUM

SELECT EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD AS CODE ,EXTN.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_EXTN EXTN WHERE EXTN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND EXTN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD ) ORDER BY EXTN.COA_EXTN_SORT_NUM

SELECT CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD AS CODE ,CMPY.COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CMPY CMPY WHERE CMPY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CMPY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.coaCmpyCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD AS CODE ,AFFL.COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_AFFL AFFL WHERE AFFL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND AFFL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD = #cMsg.coaAfflCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#
SELECT BR.COA_BR_CD AS CODE ,BR.COA_BR_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_BR BR WHERE BR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND BR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND BR.COA_BR_CD = #cMsg.coaBrCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#
SELECT CC.COA_CC_CD AS CODE ,CC.COA_CC_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CC CC WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CC.COA_CC_CD = #cMsg.coaCcCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD AS CODE ,ACCT.COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_ACCT ACCT WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD = #cMsg.coaAcctCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT PROD.COA_PROD_CD AS CODE ,PROD.COA_PROD_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_PROD PROD WHERE PROD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND PROD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PROD.COA_PROD_CD = #cMsg.coaProdCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#
SELECT CH.COA_CH_CD AS CODE ,CH.COA_CH_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CH CH WHERE CH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CH.COA_CH_CD = #cMsg.coaChCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT PROJ.COA_PROJ_CD AS CODE ,PROJ.COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_PROJ PROJ WHERE PROJ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND PROJ.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PROJ.COA_PROJ_CD = #cMsg.coaProjCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD AS CODE ,EXTN.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_EXTN EXTN WHERE EXTN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND EXTN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD = #cMsg.coaExtnCd_H1# AND ROWNUM = #rowNum#

SELECT CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD AS CODE ,CMPY.COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CMPY CMPY WHERE CMPY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CMPY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD )
AND CMPY.COA_CMPY_CD LIKE #cMsg.xxDtlCd_F1#
AND UPPER(CMPY.COA_CMPY_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#cMsg.dtlDescTxt_F1#)
ORDER BY CMPY.COA_CMPY_SORT_NUM

SELECT AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD AS CODE ,AFFL.COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_AFFL AFFL WHERE AFFL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND AFFL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD )
AND AFFL.COA_AFFL_CD LIKE #cMsg.xxDtlCd_F1#
AND UPPER(AFFL.COA_AFFL_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#cMsg.dtlDescTxt_F1#)
ORDER BY AFFL.COA_AFFL_SORT_NUM

SELECT BR.COA_BR_CD AS CODE ,BR.COA_BR_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_BR BR WHERE BR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND BR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= BR.COA_BR_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= BR.COA_BR_CD )
AND BR.COA_BR_CD LIKE #cMsg.xxDtlCd_F1#
AND UPPER(BR.COA_BR_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#cMsg.dtlDescTxt_F1#)
ORDER BY BR.COA_BR_SORT_NUM

SELECT CC.COA_CC_CD AS CODE ,CC.COA_CC_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_CC CC WHERE CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= CC.COA_CC_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= CC.COA_CC_CD )
AND CC.COA_CC_CD LIKE #cMsg.xxDtlCd_F1#
AND UPPER(CC.COA_CC_DESC_TXT) LIKE UPPER(#cMsg.dtlDescTxt_F1#)
ORDER BY CC.COA_CC_SORT_NUM

SELECT ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD AS CODE ,ACCT.COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_ACCT ACCT WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= ACCT.COA_ACCT_CD )

ORDER BY ACCT.COA_ACCT_SORT_NUM

SELECT PROD.COA_PROD_CD AS CODE ,PROD.COA_PROD_DESC_TXT AS NAME FROM COA_PROD PROD WHERE PROD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND PROD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM <= #rowNum# AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM COA_GL_SEG_NOT_ALLW_SEC ALLW WHERE ALLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND ALLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ALLW.RESRC_OBJ_NM = #cMsg.appFuncId# AND ALLW.COA_SEG_NM = #coaSegNm# AND ALLW.ENBL_FLG = 'Y' AND ALLW.COA_FROM_VAL_CD <= PROD.COA_PROD_CD AND ALLW.COA_TO_VAL_CD >= PROD.COA_PROD_CD )

AND EXTN.COA_EXTN_CD LIKE #cMsg.xxDtlCd_F1#
